title: Love Island's Anna Vakili steals BFF Amber Gill's new look as she goes for curls
text:
Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Love Island 's Anna Vakili has copied her BFF Amber Gill's latest look.

Amber wowed everyone with her hair transformation when she was the belle of the ball at the star-studded Miss Pap launch party.

Just weeks later, BFF Anna has only gone and stolen her style for her latest photo shoot and shared all the photographs online.

The pharmacist ditched her trademark straight looks for a voluminous curled style when she worked all her angles for the shoot.

In a series of Instagram stories, Anna unveiled her new look with her loyal 1.3million followers.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

While Amber had worn a curly wig, Anna nailed the look by curling her straight locks.

The Love Island beauty oozed confidence as she filmed several pieces to camera to show off her new hairstyle.

It comes after Anna has earned so much money her mum doesn't have to work anymore.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The TV personality has made it big after starring on Love Island earlier in the summer.

On the back of her sky-rocketing success from the show, Anna has landed a number of lucrative deals.

The reality star has even teamed up with her lookalike sister Mandi for her latest flashy project.

(Image: ITV)

The sisters launched a snazzy shoe collection with Simmi London.

Anna was delighted to reveal her mother no longer has to work because she has made enough money to support her.

She told New! magazine : "It's changed for the better. I'm very grateful for all of the things that have come my way, but the best thing about it is my mum doesn't have to work anymore.

"There have definitely been more ups than downs."

Anna and her sister Mandi snubbed Molly-Mae Hague from their glittering bash to celebrate their new collection.
description: The pharmacist ditched her trademark straight looks for a voluminous curled style when she worked all her angles for the shoot
